result.eng: I needed a drink but the pub was closed.
result.ga: bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúnta
result.orig: bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúnta
result.html: bhí deoch uaim ach bhí an pub dúntaI needed a drink but the pub was closed.
result.ponchtml: ḃí deoċ uaim aċ ḃí an pub dúntaI needed a drink but the pub was closed.

result.eng: She said the pub was closed.
result.ga: dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúnta
result.orig: dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúnta
result.html: dúirt sí go raibh an pub dúntaShe said the pub was closed.
result.ponchtml: dúirt sí go raiḃ an pub dúntaShe said the pub was closed.

result.html: tá do chuntas dúntaYour account is closed.
result.ponchtml: tá do ċuntas dúntaYour account is closed.

result.eng: The road was closed for fear of an accident.
result.ga: dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpiste
result.orig: dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpiste
result.html: dúnadh an bóthar ar eagla timpisteThe road was closed for fear of an accident.
result.ponchtml: dúnaḋ an bóṫar ar eagla timpisteThe road was closed for fear of an accident.

result.eng: All airports in the country were closed.
result.ga: dúnadh aerfoirt uilig na tíre
result.orig: dúnadh aerfoirt uilig na tíre
result.html: dúnadh aerfoirt uilig na tíreAll airports in the country were closed.
result.ponchtml: dúnaḋ aerfoirt uilig na tíreAll airports in the country were closed.

result.eng: He pulled a book towards himself, wrote something in it, and closed it again.
result.ga: tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
result.orig: tharraing sé air leabhar scríobh dornán inti agus dhruid arís í
